desc: Woobie Gear makes high-quality functional apparel & outdoor accessories based on the legendary military "Woobie" field blanket/poncho liner. Our hoodies, jackets, & camp blankets are lightweight, warm, packable, water-resistant, and stylish. Perfect for the outdoors sportsman lifestyle. Now accepting new dealers.

layout.text:
THE MOST COMFORTABLE RANGER
PANTIES ON THE PLANET. PERIOD.
